subtitleNullable: Manual labelling of 49 Peruvian's News videos.
descriptionNullable:
### Context

We want to study person's behavior based on other parameters than the coordinates or the object detection, so we make a dataset that include columns for Actions, Clothing, Banners handling (For Protesting actions), etc. So we make a dataset that mix 90% of manual and 10% of automatic labeling.

### Content

The dataset consist of three (3) files.

PND.zip - The data source itself. (300 images, .jpg format, YUV)
Dataset.xlsx - A more visually dataset with table format.
Dataset.csv - A detailed dataset for ML intends.

### Acknowledgements

Many thanks to Rodrigo Molero that helps up on the manual labelling process and the CNN implementation.

### Inspiration

We want to understand the behavior of the person's that are involved in violent situations, why they make them and what they do in specific scenarios.
